item.description: Emily Vogel Pronouns: she/they/he University Degree Year Towson University B.S. - Computer Science [Track: Software Engineering] 2020 Towson University M.S. - Computer Science 2022 Emily works as the Software Architect for SecurEd Inc. - a cybersecurity education nonprofit - and is the co-founder of Mint Print LLC - a Web3 based company revolutionizing the digital book industry. item.content:
Emily Vogel

Pronouns: she/they/he

University Degree Year
Towson University B.S. - Computer Science [Track: Software Engineering] 2020
Towson University M.S. - Computer Science 2022

Emily works as the Software Architect for SecurEd Inc. - a cybersecurity education nonprofit - and is the co-founder of Mint Print LLC - a Web3 based company revolutionizing the digital book industry. They works across multiple areas, mostly involving full-stack development. Emily is actively involved in Software Engineering Club at Towson University. They also enjoy reading comics, playing video games, and playing tabletop role playing games in their spare time.

GitHub
